flavor: It takes power to create power.
printed_text: When you score Helium-3 Deposit, place up to 2 power counters on a card with at least 1 power counter on it.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Helium-3 Deposit, place up to 2 power counters on a card with at least 1 power counter on it.

flavor: Recycling the energy entering the system via a run is both responsible and economical.
printed_text:
[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] or draws 1 card.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] or draws 1 card.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] or draws 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit or draws 1 card. Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit or draws 1 card. Subroutine The Corp gains 1 credit or draws 1 card.

printed_text: [click]: Place 1 power counter on IT Department. Hosted power counter: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice has +1 strength until the end of the turn for each power counter (including the one spent) on IT Department.
stripped_printed_text: click: Place 1 power counter on IT Department. Hosted power counter: Choose a rezzed piece of ice. That ice has +1 strength until the end of the turn for each power counter (including the one spent) on IT Department.

flavor: The forge must never run cold.
printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text: The trash cost of each card is increased by 1 for each facedown card in Archives.
stripped_printed_text: The trash cost of each card is increased by 1 for each facedown card in Archives.

flavor: A masterpiece of cloning and hardware technology, Jinteki created homo vacuo operae, commonly called "turtlebacks", to operate for long periods of time within a vacuum.
printed_text: Gain 1[credit] whenever you create a server.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 1 credit whenever you create a server.

printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Rez 1 piece of ice for each tag the Runner has, ignoring all costs.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Rez 1 piece of ice for each tag the Runner has, ignoring all costs.

flavor: You gotta pay the troll toll to get in.
printed_text: When the Runner encounters Troll, <trace>2</trace>. If successful, the Runner must lose [click] or end the run.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters Troll, trace 2 if successful, the Runner must lose click or end the run.

flavor: Virgo promised love, but offered only jealousy.
printed_text: [subroutine] <trace>2</trace>. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, give the Runner 1 tag.

printed_text:
As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit] for each advancement token on that agenda.
Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 2 credits for each advancement token on that agenda. Limit 1 per deck.

flavor:
There drew he forth the brand Excalibur,
And o'er him, drawing it, the winter moon,
Brightening the skirts of a long cloud, ran forth
And sparkled keen with frost against the hilt:
For all the haft twinkled with diamond sparks,
Myriads of topaz-lights, and jacinth work
Of subtlest jewellery. -Lord Tennyson
printed_text: [subroutine] The Runner cannot make another run this turn.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Runner cannot make another run this turn.

printed_text: Remote server only. [trash]: Trash all cards installed in the root of or protecting this server. X, where X is equal to the number of cards trashed. If successful, do 3 net damage. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
stripped_printed_text: Remote server only. trash: Trash all cards installed in the root of or protecting this server. Trace[X], where X is equal to the number of cards trashed. If successful, do 3 net damage. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

flavor: "What terrors hatch in her dispossessed mind, waiting for their moment to be born? My money's on a double-helix rainbow with the head of a panda." -fakespeare
printed_text: When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Incubator. [click], [trash]: Move all virus counters from Incubator to another installed virus program.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on Incubator. click, trash: Move all virus counters from Incubator to another installed virus program.

flavor: Digs in deeper than its Alabama counterpart.
printed_text:
Whenever the Corp loses at least 1[credit], gain 1[credit].
Trash Ixodidae if the Corp purges virus counters.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp loses at least 1 credit, gain 1 credit. Trash Ixodidae if the Corp purges virus counters.

printed_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may search your stack for 1 program. Install it, paying 3[credit] less for each piece of ice protecting R&D, and then take 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may search your stack for 1 program. Install it, paying 3 credits less for each piece of ice protecting R&D, and then take 1 tag.

flavor: "All programs are connected. The data that runs through one runs through all." -Rielle "Kit" Peddler
printed_text: Draw 1 card whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
stripped_printed_text: Draw 1 card whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.

flavor: δὶς ἐς τὸν αὐτὸν ποταμὸν οὐκ ἂν ἐμβαίης
printed_text: This program gets +1 strength for each unused MU. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 code gate or 1 barrier subroutine.
stripped_printed_text: This program gets +1 strength for each unused MU. Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 code gate or 1 barrier subroutine.

flavor: "Sometimes it's helpful to remember that you're not the only one who loves money." -Gabriel Santiago
printed_text: Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X[credit] as an additional cost to rez the first unrezzed piece of ice approached.
stripped_printed_text: Make a run. During this run, the Corp must pay X credits as an additional cost to rez the first unrezzed piece of ice approached.

flavor: The datastream slipped away, and it felt like being born for a second time, if only you could remember the first. A rush of air fills the lungs to bursting, and you gasp it out, coughing and choking as the dim lights of the room shine with the brilliance of a thousand suns.
printed_text: Gain 1[credit] whenever you jack out.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 1 credit whenever you jack out.

printed_text:
When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this resource, load 3 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, remove 1 hosted power counter and draw 2 cards.
